author: Conor Gallagher
title: Three chances to be given for breaching coronavirus restrictions
description: Gardaí advised to use four-step response to breaking unnecessary travel ban
content:
People caught by gardaí engaging in unnecessary travel this weekend will be given at least three opportunities to comply with the law before facing arrest.
The direction is contained in a document seen by The Irish Times which was issued to every superintend… [+2997 chars]
